mapper.select: SELECT board.seq, board.title, board.content, users.nickname, board.create_dt, board.update_dt, board.boardOption, board.view, ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY board.create_dt DESC) AS rownum, cc.comment_count FROM board AS board INNER JOIN users AS users ON users.seq = board.user_seq LEFT JOIN ( SELECT board.seq, COUNT(bc.seq) AS comment_count FROM board_comment AS bc INNER JOIN board AS board ON board.seq = bc.board_seq WHERE bc.delete_yn = 'N' GROUP BY board.seq ORDER BY board.seq ) AS cc ON cc.seq = board.seq WHERE board.delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY board.create_dt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( title, content, create_dt, user_seq, boardOption ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIME(), #{user_seq}, #{boardOption} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET delete_yn = 'Y', delete_dt = CURRENT_TIME() WHERE seq = #{seq}
UPDATE board SET view = view+1 WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY nb.importance, nb.update_dt DESC, nb.create_dt DESC) AS rownum, nb.*, users.nickname FROM notice_board AS nb INNER JOIN users users ON users.seq = nb.user_seq WHERE nb.delete_yn = 'N' AND nb.board_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY nb.importance, nb.update_dt DESC, nb.create_dt DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, boardOption = #{boardOption}, content = #{content}, update_dt = CURRENT_TIME() WHERE seq = #{seq}
